definition: adornment/to adorn/dress/clothing/costume (of an actor in a play)/to play a role/to pretend/to install/to fix/to wrap (sth in a bag)/to load/to pack

sentences.english: Is it plausible to ban the costume drama at prime time?
sentences.chinese: 黃金時段將禁播古裝劇，這樣合理嗎？

sentences.english: She came in the middle of a French costume picture.
sentences.chinese: 她進來時正在演一個法國古裝戲。

sentences.english: I just see a group of modern people wearing ancient costumes and performing.
sentences.chinese: 我感覺就是看一羣現代人穿着古裝在表演而已。

sentences.english: All our period films seem to be mixed with martial arts and action.
sentences.chinese: 幾乎所有的古裝片都包含了中國武術和動作片的元素。

sentences.english: Another similarly dressed in ancient costumes young man said.
sentences.chinese: 又一個同樣穿着古裝的年輕男子說道。

sentences.english: Why do Taoist monks keep long hair, and wear ancient costumes?
sentences.chinese: 道士爲什麼穿古裝，蓄頭髮？

sentences.english: No words are nece ary between two loving hearts.
sentences.chinese: 兩顆相愛的心之彩虹堂古裝間不需要言語。

sentences.english: Do you think costume piece has mixed too much modern character?
sentences.chinese: 古裝劇是否該參雜過多的現代元素呢？

sentences.english: The costume piece played on the feudal theatre has changed into no…
sentences.chinese: 封建劇場上昔日上演的古裝劇，已換成了新的文明戲。

sentences.english: 12-25 She came in the middle of a French costume picture.
sentences.chinese: 她進來時正在演一個法國古裝戲。

sentences.english: Yes, she played a lot in the Chinese ancient pictures.
sentences.chinese: 是的，她拍了很多古裝戲。

sentences.english: She likes this picture book of ancient beauties.
sentences.chinese: 她特別喜歡這本畫滿了古裝粉黛的畫冊。

sentences.english: She also has played plenty of advertisements which were very successful.
sentences.chinese: 是的，她拍了很多古裝戲。

sentences.english: We went to a Halloween party where everyone wore ancient costume .
sentences.chinese: 我們去參加一個萬聖節化裝舞會，人人都身着古裝。

sentences.english: Many satellite TV stations will ban the costume drama at prime time. What is your opinion?
sentences.chinese: 各大衛視黃金檔禁播古裝劇，你又怎麼看這件事情呢？

definition: third category movie (containing sexual or violent content)
large-scale Chinese opera/Beijing opera/major dramatic production (movie, TV series etc)
idol drama/drama series in which the actors are chosen for their preexisting popularity with young viewers
to begin shooting (a movie, a scene of a movie etc)/to start the bidding (auction)/to start a trading session (stock market)
Demigods and Semidevils, wuxia novel by Jin Yong 金庸[Jin1 Yong1] and its TV and screen adaptations
Legend of the Condor Heroes, wuxia (武侠, martial arts chivalry) novel by Jin Yong 金庸 and its screen adaptations
Zhao Wei or Vicky Zhao (1976-), Chinese film star
cast and crew/performers and production team
currently popular (of movie stars, singers etc)
